column1: accordance with Section 7 of the TAC Act:
1.  Whether  the  TAC  has  erred  in  interpreting  the  ‘value  of
supply of goods or services’ pursuant to Section 5 (1) of the
Value Added Tax Act No. 14 of 2002.
2. Whether the TAC has erred in interpreting the ‘open market
value’ pursuant to Section 83 of the Value Added Tax Act
3. Whether the TAC has erred in interpreting the ‘adjustment of
tax by credit or debit notes’ as stipulated in Section 25 of the
Value Added Tax Act No. 14 of 2002. (vide ‘X4’).
